head.supplied: QUARTERLY ESTIMATE. ¶ To the Honorable ¶ the Chief Secretary ¶ Sir, ¶ ¶ I have the honor to submit for approval the following Estimate* of Expenditure during the Quarter ending ¶ 30th September ¶ ...

div.p: C85/7535, unit 118, VPRS 3992/P inward registered correspondence, VA 475 Chief Secretary's Department, Public Record Office, Victoria.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: center;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; margin-left: 0.3335in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: -0.3335in; font-size: 9pt;

note.p: MS written by G. Luehmann and signed by M. MS is undated, but dated on the basis of the date of Berry's signature and a MS annotation, in an unknown hand: 'Ret 27.7.85'; since 27 July was a Monday, the item is dated to the preceding Saturday when we know, from other correspondence, that M was working.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;

div.p: To the Honorable the Chief Secretary

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;

div.p: I have the honor to submit for approval the following Estimate* of Expenditure during the Quarter ending 30th September 1885.
